info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 3:48PM EDT until July 26 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR MACOMB COUNTY... At 346 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pontiac to Sterling Heights to near St. Clair Shores, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... St. Clair Shores and Clinton around 355 PM EDT. Mount Clemens and Macomb Township around 400 PM EDT. Romeo around 405 PM EDT. New Baltimore and Armada around 410 PM EDT. Richmond around 415 PM EDT. Memphis around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Fraser, Eastpointe, Washington, New Haven, Stoney Creek Metro Park and Center Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
